remarks: The set of walks of length 2 (in a graph) as ordered triple. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Feb-2018.)
statement:
2wlksot $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( V 2WalksOt E ) = { t e. ( ( V X. V ) X. V ) | E. a e. V E. b e. V t e. ( a ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) b ) } ) $.
$d E a b t $.
$d V a b t $.
